kassette.onboarding.one.title: Kassette - Disclaimer
kassette.onboarding.one.alpha: Kassette is ALPHA-QUALITY software, no guarantees are made as to whether or not it properly functions, and functionality may or may not be removed by release; if you do not trust this mod then close Minecraft NOW, and remove or disable this using your preferred method. If you choose to proceed and encounter any issues, please report them to our GitHub repository at "https://github.com/Spadium/kassette"
kassette.onboarding.two.title: Kassette - Set up tutorial (1/2)
kassette.onboarding.two.section.one:
Currently, Kassette only has one useful MediaProvider, the Spotify MediaProvider. To use this as your provider you need three things:
- A Spotify Premium account
- A Spotify developer account and app
- A working internet connection
kassette.onboarding.three.title: Kassette - Set up tutorial (2/2)
kassette.onboarding.three.section.config:
To choose the Spotify provider, you need to set the default provider as "kassette:spotify" in '.minecraft/config/kassette/main.json', and fill in the values for clientId and clientSecret according to your Spotify application.
As soon as you are ready click on "Proceed", this will open your default browser and give you a Spotify login dialog!
